thread.title: He’s no goose! Top Gun happy to play ‘Iceman’
thread.title_full: He’s no goose! Top Gun happy to play ‘Iceman’

title: He’s no goose! Top Gun happy to play ‘Iceman’
text:
Rugby World Cup: Wallabies top gun Bernard Foley happy to play role of ‘Iceman’   Wallabies top gun Bernard Foley happy to play role of ‘Iceman’   A look back at the many times Bernard Foley has stepped up 1:50 
Rugby World Cup: Bernard Foley missed three conversions in the Wallabies' quarter-final against Scotland, but when it really mattered, he stepped up to the plate.. And it's not the first time he's done so. October 19th 2015 4 days ago /video/video.news.com.au/Sport/Rugby Union/Rugby World Cup/ 
THE story goes Bernard Foley wasn’t convinced about the “Iceman” nickname because he thought that character dies in Top Gun. 
After a little more clarification that it’s “Goose” that doesn’t make it, a smiling Foley was somewhat more content. 
“Okay, although you always want to be Maverick because he gets the girl doesn’t he?” Foley laughed. 
“I’ll be Iceman. It doesn’t bother me.”
